name: Shengwei An
content: Shengwei's Homepage Shengwei An swan AT vt.edu "Forget what is behind and strain toward what is ahead." About I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Virginia Tech. My research focuses on Security, Privacy, and Intellectual Property Protection in Neural Networks. I received my Ph.D. degree from Purdue University, advised by Prof. Xiangyu Zhang. I received my M.S and B.S. degrees from Nanjing University (NJU), advised by Prof. Xiaoxing Ma. I am actively looking for self-motivated Ph.D. students interested in working on cutting-edge problems in AI security and privacy. If you're passionate about these areas, feel free to reach out to me!
